module.name: Outbound Route Permissions
module.changelog: *0.3.2.3* Changed font size and color on empty redirect field error message to make it more obvious *0.3.2.2* If redirect selected make sure redirect field is not empty or whitespace only *0.3.2.1* Minor changes to instructions on main page *0.3.2.0* Bug fixes in Ticket #3655 and Ticket #3669 *0.3.1.0* Inserts ROUTENAME into routes so core does not have to *0.3.0.0* Added ability to redirect back with a prefix, added 'fail' destination. *0.2.0.0* Fixed bug with routenames not being displayed properly if they contained a hyphen *0.1.0.0* Original Release
module.description: Allows you to block access to various routes, on a per-extension basis. Note that this module requires a database to be available AT ALL TIMES.
